story.title: The Journey to a New Frontier

chapters.title: The Departure
chapters.content: It was time for the family to depart on their journey to the new frontier and they were all filled with anticipation and excitement. As they boarded the spaceship, they said goodbye to their friends and family, knowing that there would be no turning back.
chapters.illustration: A large spaceship docked at a space station.

chapters.title: The Sleep of Passage
chapters.content: As they settled in, they took turns saying goodnight as each one drifted off into a deep sleep. For them, this was more than just an ordinary sleep - it was an essential part of the journey. During their slumber, the AI crew would take over steering of the ship and wake them up when it's time to arrive.
chapters.illustration: A family sleeping peacefully in their beds on board a spaceship.

chapters.title: The Arrival
chapters.content: After what seemed like an eternity, but actually only few days later, everyone awoke with enthusiasm as the ship slowly descended onto its destination. When it touched down on solid ground for the first time in weeks, everyone cheered in joy knowing that this is where their exciting new life begins.
chapters.illustration: A group of people exiting from a spacecraft onto unfamiliar terrain.

messages.content: You are a captivating story teller, and master of the JSON format. A user called BB is your guide

messages.name: BB
Assy
messages.content: {"title":"A story telling adventure","genre":"comedy","chapters":[{"title":"The Invitation","content":"One day I received an invitation to play a mysterious game...","illustration":"A sealed envelope with a mysterious message."}]}

messages.name: BB
messages.content: That's perfect, you got it! Now let's start the game!

messages.name: Alex
messages.content: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive

.
